name: The Climb: A MixAndJam2020 Submission
description:
The game

An entry to the Jam "MixAndJam" 2020. The theme was Mix Genres, so I mixed platformer and rythm game and it turned into some weird clone of Getting Over It. That's fine by me.

How to play 

- Use arrows to move
- Space to jump (and double Jump)

Credits

Gameplay and code by me

Music by Kevin MacLeod (Incompetech, links bellow)

Visuals : POLYGON Prototype Pack, some Fonts and UI Elements by kenney.nl packs.

Unity Assets : Beautiful Transitions, Cinemachine, Easy Character Movement
